import { useEffect } from "react"; function Skills({ skillsData }) { const select = (el, all = false) => { el = el.trim() if (all) { return [...document.querySelectorAll(el)] } else { return document.querySelector(el) } } useEffect(() => { let progress = select('.progress .progress-bar', true); progress.forEach((el) => { el.animate({ width: el.getAttribute('aria-valuenow') + '%', }, 2500); }); setTimeout(() => { progress.forEach((el) => { el.style.width = el.getAttribute('aria-valuenow') + '%' }); }, 2500) }, []); return (

Skills

{skillsData.description}

HTML 100%
CSS 90%
JavaScript 85%
React 90%
Node 70%
Typescript 75%
); } export default Skills;
